attributes.action: Abolish Boris Johnson as prime minister
attributes.additional_details:
Abolish Boris Johnson 
Mocked Chinese accents (2003)
In a Spectator column, Mr Johnson wrote a mocking account of how a Chinese air stewardess spoke.
Anti Semitic and racist remarks 
During his time as shadow arts minister, Boris Johnson wrote a using the n word and racial stereotypes in passages.
Islamophobia
In 2018, he compared Muslim women to “bank robbers” and “letterboxes,” and said he would ask a person with a niqab to remove it before speaking to him.
Plus more! He never apologised
attributes.background:
Boris Johnson is a menace to society. He is a racist, sexist and criminal man.
Why has his discrimination been deemed acceptable?It’s time he is stopped and faces the punishments of his actions.
He has never apologised, and with that can we really trust him?

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
